Ani-Groo

Where your pet feels like at home

Read about us

Ani-Groo is the best option for your pet

Pet grooming done right! No waiting list!

Having your pet groomed with "Auntie Brenda" at Ani-Groo provides peace of mind knowing your pet is in safe, experienced and loving hands! Brenda graduated with honours from Bramalea Dog and Cat Grooming School in 1988. She started with her genuine love and passion for grooming dogs which continues to this day. She opened her first shop in Montreal, in 1988 and from there she went on to open several "Ani-Groo" grooming salons across Canada with locations in Quebec, Oakville, Alberta and Saskatchewan. She most recently has spent 12 years grooming in Montreal. Brenda's compassionate grooming on animals has achieved several 1st place grooming awards, as well as several Gold Readers choice awards. "Your pets are not just another groom. I treat them like my family" - Brenda
